sourcesContent:
My commitments

Below you can see the list of your commitments.

Please make sure you answer all due and overdue commitments!

Loading...

{{commitment.title}} {{commitment.description}} Answer {{commitment.deadline}} {{commitment.status}}
import { Component, Inject, ViewChild } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Commitment } from '../interfaces'; @Component({ selector: 'app-commitment-list', templateUrl: './commitment-list.html' }) export class CommitmentListComponent { public commitments: Commitment[] = []; constructor(http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') baseUrl: string) { http.get(baseUrl + 'commitments').subscribe(result => { this.commitments = result; }, error => console.error(error)); } }
